QuestData.Title: Waste Water Cleanup
QuestData.Description:
First things first--I need my base of operations back! But the elementals running amok around here have made it very difficult to gain even a toehold.
And of course it is those wretched gnolls' fault.
The gnolls have dumped so much refuse, offal, and Light knows what else into the lake that the local elementals have started to go berserk.
Be a dear and clean up a few of the more revolting messes before things come to a head. And, more importantly, before they stain my robes permanently!
QuestData.LogDescription: Clean $1oa Rotting Piles from the lake.
QuestData.RewardText: I can taste the difference already!
